title: David’s Final Instructions
summary: David gathers Israel’s leaders to charge Solomon with building the temple. He explains that God chose Solomon and gives him the temple plans revealed by the Spirit. David urges Solomon to be strong and faithful in obeying God.

faq.question: Why did David gather the leaders?
faq.answer: To publicly affirm Solomon’s role and encourage support for the temple project.

faq.question: What instructions did David give Solomon?
faq.answer: To seek God, obey His commands, and be courageous in building the temple.
